==Lore==
The building is an old home owned by the Nui family, which they turned into a restaurant at Chief [[Amina]]'s suggestion.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Kupo Nui}}</ref> Business is steady, but they are frequently short-staffed. They provide a wide range of services for guests, including use of the kitchen facilities and tents for those who want to sleep near the water.<ref name="GDBB">{{Ref/BB|Golden Dusk Bulletin Board}}</ref>

The Golden Dusk has held 242 iterations of the Inferno Stomach Supremo contest, a regional eating competition. The current champion is [[Varesa]] of the [[Collective of Plenty]].<ref name="GDBB" />
